name: Tianyu Jiang 0001
content: Tianyu Jiang's Homepage Tianyu Jiang Assistant Professor Computer Science Department University of Cincinnati Office: Digital Futures 510I Email: tianyu.jiahahahahang@uc.edu Home News Lab Publications Teaching I am an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science department at the University of Cincinnati, where I established and direct the CincyNLP Lab. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Utah, advised by Prof. Ellen Riloff. Before that, I got my B.S. in Mathematics from Nanjing University. My main research interests are in the area of natural language processing, specifically in computational semantics, emotion understanding, multimodality, LLM efficiency and interpretability. News 2025-10: Serve as an Area Chair for EACL 2026, LREC 2026. 2025-08: 3 papers accepted to EMNLP 2025. 2025-07: Serve as an Area Chair for EMNLP 2025. 2025-05: 1 paper accepted to ACL 2025. 2025-03: I am honored to receive the 2025 URC Faculty Scholars Award. 2025-02: 1 paper accepted to NAACL 2025.
